title: #BlackBirdersWeek Seeks To Make The Great Outdoors Open To All
description: Happy #BlackBirdersWeek! This week, black birders around the world are rallying around Christian Cooper, a black man and avid birder, who was harassed by a white woman while birding in Central Park. We talk with#BlackBirdersWeek co-founder Chelsea Connor about how black birders are changing the narrative around who gets to enjoy nature and the challenges black birders face.

itunes:summary: Happy #BlackBirdersWeek! Co-founder Chelsea Connor shares how black birders are changing the narrative about who gets to be safe in nature.
